channel.title: Visigoths vs. Mall Goths: The Hungry G-G-G-Ghost!
channel.description:
![VG vs MG|331x500](upload://9pFTV9m4YfQtGX60HuPssXt8peE.jpeg)
The mall is haunted! Did Vulfi disturb the dead in *izōs* attempt to get back home? Did Nocturne pull another unwitting soul into the 20th century? Will the Goths be able to put aside their rivalry to save the mall? Find out in “Visigoths vs. Mall Goths: The Hungry G-G-G-Ghost!!!”
This game is scheduled for 3 hour-sessions using Zoom. If all players consent, it will be recorded.
There will be 4 sessions total. Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Lucian Kahn’s *Visigoths vs. Mall Goths* is a tabletop role-playing game and dating sim about the conflicts and romances among the warriors who sacked ancient Rome and 20th century spooky teens, set in a suburban Los Angeles shopping mall during 1996. There are a lot of bisexuals.
We will use the X-Card, and Lines and Veils, and observe an Open Door policy. All players must abide by the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
All Access Time. 27 May 2020 17:00 UTC
Session 1 Wednesday 3 June 2020 17:00-20:00 UTC https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7nX1dvhIOlwUqpcoRF
Session 2 Wednesday 10 June 2020 17:00-20:00 UTC https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7nXievOkcKJd3oDIG0
Session 3 Wednesday 17 June 2020 17:00-20:00 UTC https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7nYCnOjy_L5OA-bekU
Session 4 Wednesday 24 June 2020 17:00-20:00 UTC https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7nYoC2_oAa4RPL9lAx
